segments.text: We've been waiting here for nearly ten minutes now , and there still isn't a bus in sight .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm afraid we'll be late for the party .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Have you got the time , Tom ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , my watch says a quarter to seven . but there is something wrong with my watch !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But you bought it only last month .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , but ever since I bought it , it gains about five minutes a day , so I ' Ve got to have it repaired .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How long will it take us to get there ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think about ten minutes by bus .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's not far away , then . Let's walk , it's beginning to rain .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Wait ! I think I see a bus coming now . Let's hope it's the No . 22 bus .
segments.speaker: S2
